power.title: Advancing Lunge
power.fluff: You spring forward to make a quick attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to 2 squares, and a minimum of 1 square.
If you do not shift the full distance, you can shift the remaining squares after making the attack.

section.name: Light Blade or Spear:
section.text: Shift up to a number of squares equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier instead.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If you have combat advantage against the target, you deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you have combat advantage against the target, you deal damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Armor-Piercing Strike
power.fluff: You drive your weapon through a weak point in your foe's defenses

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Axe or Heavy Blade:
section.text: You can make the attack against Fortitude instead

section.name: Light Blade or Spear:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Light Blade or Spear:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Pick:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Blinding Smash
power.fluff: A sharp blow leaves your enemy seeing only starts

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus + the number of healing surges you have expended, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is blinded until the end of your next turn or (save ends), whichever lasts longer.

section.name: Hammer or Mace:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Bull Charge
power.fluff: You take a brutal swing that knocks your enemy backward, allowing you to step forward and attempt a knockdown

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push the target 1 square, then shift the same distance to a space adjacent to it.
If you used this power on a charge, make the secondary attack.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage, and you knock the target prone.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When you charge, you can use this attack in place of a melee basic attack.

power.title: Crushing Blow
power.fluff: Taking a full swing, you deliver a brutal blow to a foe trapped between you and an obstacle

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the target is between you and blocking terrain

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If the target is prone, you deal an additional +1[W] damage.

power.title: Dance of Steel
power.fluff: Testing your enemy's defenses with your weapon weaving in and out, you lash out with a sudden attack that leaves your foe in immobilizing pain

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
If the target is already immobilized, you also knock it prone.

section.name: Pick:
section.text: If the target is already immobilized, you can choose to also deal additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier and prevent the target from getting up from prone before the start of your next turn.
The additional effect ends if you make an attack with the pick or are no longer within reach of the target.

power.title: Daunting Onslaught
power.fluff: You bring down your fury upon an enemy, frightening nearby foes with your brutality

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

The target and each enemy adjacent to you take a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn. If you are trained in Intimidate, each enemy adjacent to the target also takes the penalty.

power.title: Deflecting Shield
power.fluff: As you hammer your foe with an attack, you move your shield to deflect its counterattack to another enemy

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The first time the target attacks you before the end of your next turn, one enemy adjacent to you other than the target also takes the minimum damage for the attack. This can make the enemy take damage twice from the same attack if it was already a target for the attack.

power.title: Immediate Vengeance
power.fluff: An attack gets through, but you smash your shield down upon the attacker with crippling force

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within your touch reach hits you or an ally with a melee attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength +3 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Strength +6

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the start of its next turn.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: +1d10 additional damage.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: +2d10 additional damage.

power.title: Parry and Riposte
power.fluff: You parry an attack and quickly counter with your own, throwing your foe off balance

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within your reach misses you or an ally with a melee attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the start of its next turn.

power.title: Power Strike
power.fluff: By pushing yourself beyond your limits, you unleash your full wrath against a foe

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee basic attack or a Fighter at-will attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] damage.

power.title: Precise Strike
power.fluff: You make sure you land an attack on your opponent

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength +4 vs. AC
Roll the attack twice and use either result

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Half of 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half of the minimum damage roll for the attack.

power.title: Probing Attack
power.fluff: With a careful strike, you find a weak spot in your enemy's defenses

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
You gain a +4 power bonus to all attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You gain a +2 power bonus to all attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power in place of a melee basic attack when you make a reactive strike or use your enforce challenge.

power.title: Rain of Blows
power.fluff: You become a blur of motion, raining a series of blows upon your opponent

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage.

section.name: Axe or Pick:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Flail:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Heavy Blade:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Polearm or Staff:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] damage.

section.name: Hammer or Mace:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Light Blade or Spear:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Restoring Strike
power.fluff: Your weapon impacts with a satisfying crunch, filling you with new confidence

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Endurance.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength -4 vs. AC
You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if you are bloodied
You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-third the number of healing surges you have expended

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier + one-half the number of healing surges you have remaining damage.
If you use your second wind before the end of your next turn, you regain additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.
If you are bloodied, this power has the Invigorating keyword and you gain temporary hit points equal to your 2 + Constitution modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you can use your second wind as a minor action.

power.title: Rhino Strike
power.fluff: Rushing into the thick of battle, you smash your foe with your eager attack

section.name: Shield:
section.text: If you are using a shield, your movement during the charge does not provoke reactive strikes.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
The attack deals +1 additional damage for each square beyond 2 you move during the charge.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you moved more than 2 squares during the charge, you deal your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.

power.title: Shield Edge Block
power.fluff: You retaliate to your your foe's attack with a quick slam of your shield's edge that hinders its aim

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy in your touch reach targets you with a melee or close attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength +3 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Strength +6

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: +2d6 additional damage.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: +3d6 additional damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to all attack rolls for the triggering attack equal to your Wisdom modifier, and cannot score a critical hit against you with the attack.

power.title: Shield Slam
power.fluff: You follow up a successful attack by slamming your shield into the enemy, knocking it aside

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be using a shield

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy within your touch reach with a melee attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: If the triggering attack was a critical hit, you knock the target prone.

power.title: Slamming Rush
power.fluff: You yank your grabbed foe across the battlefield before slamming it to the ground

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed.
For each square you move, you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you. The creature remains grabbed, and you do not provoke a reactive strike from the target for this movement.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude (unarmed)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (unarmed) + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
If the target is adjacent to blocking or damaging terrain, add you Dexterity modifier to the damage.

power.title: Sweeping Blow
power.fluff: Seeing your enemies press in, you swing your weapon in a wide arch to strike many of them at once

section.name: Attack:
section.target: each enemy in the burst you can see
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Axe or Pick:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Constitution modifier

section.name: Flail or Heavy Blade:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Dexterity modifier

section.name: Staff:
section.text: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss (two weapons):
section.text: If you are wielding two melee weapons, you deal damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus.
